attributes.action: allow public voting on motions before MPs at Westminster and petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Want the Govt to allow the public to vote on motions before MP's in Westminster to resolve the situation where our local MP or their political party doesnt represent our individual views. Facilities for voting should be provided online or at local govt offices. In addition (online) petitions should also allow voting as the current method ie this method doesnt represent those not in favour of a said petition.
